mapper.select: select c.* from contents as c join follow as f on (c.user_id = f.follow_id) where f.follower_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into contents (content_val, user_id, timestamp, hashtag) values (#{content_val}, #{user_id}, now(), #{hashtag})
mapper.select: select max(content_id) as content_id from contents where user_id = #{user_id}
